attributes.action: Sack Gordon Brown and outline an emergency plan to remedy the £75bn pensions hole
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown has ignored the advice of Treasury officials and created a £75bn hole in pensions.  This catastrophic decision and the subsequent attempts to stop information concerning the decision reaching the public is a sackable offence.  Tony Blair now needs to outline how he plans to repair the issue and ensure that pensions can be relied upon.
